column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////As a native New Jerseyan
column3: I feel confident in my knowledge of proper pizza. That being said
column4: Lou Malnati's was the absolute worst pizza I've ever had in my entire life. That honor used to belong to the Little Italy section of Cleveland. I have no idea where these positive reviewers are from
column5: but they clearly don't know pizza. Don't waste my time with "But it's Chicago style." No. Just no. I was given a plate of crust with a cheese and sauce swamp on top of it. To top it off
column6: it had no taste whatsoever. This putrid pie was complimented by tremendously slow service. I occasionally wake up in the middle of the night with PTSD episodes of this horrible horrible pizza.
